calibrain/calibre-web-automated-book-downloader

Automates book downloads for Calibre-Web libraries

Related repos

  • Web app for browsing, reading, and managing eBooks with your Calibre library
  • automates Calibre-Web with extra ebook management features
  • translate ebooks in Calibre with multiple engines
  • Downloads books from Internet Archive as PDF files

  • Tool for bulk downloading Kindle ebooks
